project.description: This will backup old Extractor.jar and replace with new jar.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_WEB_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the container name used by the docker engine. (gobii-web-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EXTRACTOR_JAR_DOWNLOAD_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The download link for the datatimescope.war file. These downloads are hosted in the gobii.deploy.bash dowloads link. [Here](https://bitbucket.org/gobiiproject/gobii.deploy.bash/downloads/)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EXTRACTOR_JAR_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the tomcat location on the web-node. (/usr/local/tomcat/webapps)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EXTRACTOR_JAR_HOTFIX_FILE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the file downloaded as the gobii-web.war from bitbucket. (Extractor.jar_222hotfix_20200812)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the branch being used for the gobii.deploy.bash repo. (release/2.2.2) (develop)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
#--------------------------------------#
set -e # Abort script at first error set -u # Attempt to use undefined variable outputs error message #set -x # Verbose with commands displayed
#--------------------------------------#
# run crop war replacement scripts time bash hotfix/hotfix_scripts/hotfix_replace_extractor.sh
#--------------------------------------#
echo "GOBii Hotfix Complete. Good Bye." echo;
